add_note: INSERT INTO user_notes (user_id, title, date, full_note, short_note) VALUES (%s, %s, %s, %s, %s)
select_all_notes_by_title: SELECT full_note, date FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND title = %s
select_note: SELECT full_note FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND title = %s AND date = %s
delete_note_by_date: DELETE FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND title = %s AND date = %s
delete_note: DELETE FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s AND title = %s
select_all_notes: SELECT title, date FROM user_notes WHERE user_id = %s
